name: DualKNoid
description:
DualKNoid is an entry for the Global Game Jam that we made within the MalagaJam Weekend XIII celebration. The theme was "Duality".

Use left/right arrows or A/D keys in your keyboard to rotate the ball.

The goal is to maximize the number of bounces. If the ball collides with a square with the same color, one bounce is incremented. Otherwise, the square is removed. You lose when the ball moves below or above the limits of the board.

Credits: Francisco Moyano and Sergio Dominguez. Special thanks to Manuela Ruiz.
